overview: For over 25 years, nobody has filmed big tits in paradise like The SCORE Group, and this once-in-a-lifetime collection brings you 21 scenes of sun-drenched fun in the tropics. Beautiful, busty babes with all-natural tits bouncing on the beach, getting wet and having fun in the sun in idyllic tropical locations. A true collector's edition that would cost you several hundred dollars if you tried to put it together yourself. We put it together for you at an unbelievable bargain price.
title: Best Of On Location
